items.sentence: Tom and Mary often play table tennis together.
Tom and Mary haven't been here in a long time.
Tom and Mary don't speak French to each other.
Tom and Mary did their homework before dinner.
Tom and Mary decided to go to Boston together.
Tom and I were discussing that just yesterday.
The last time I saw Tom he was wearing a suit.
Neither Tom nor Mary has been told to go home.
Neither Tom nor Mary has a very stressful job.
I heard Tom banging on your window last night.
